TEI.2.document_title: John Raney to Stephen F Austin, 11-23-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: John Raney to Austin, November 23, 1830. Illness prevents visit to San Felipe concerning land. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 539
